original_title: 実録ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 16
overview: The 16th installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted. A contributor who visited to find out the truth about a toilet that claims to hear a woman's groans. The situation becomes tense at the disabled toilet that was unlocked. A door that suddenly closes, a woman reflected on the wall. The urban legend was true.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 16
